function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Increased population density in urban areas","Impact":"Higher risk of contagious disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing strict hygiene and sanitation measures, and promoting vaccination programs","Technologies":"IoT sensors for monitoring public spaces, smart waste management systems","People":"Urban residents, commuters, and workers","Owner":"City authorities, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Dependency on new technologies and digital platforms","Impact":"Vulnerability to cyber attacks and data breaches","Mitigation":"Investing in robust cybersecurity measures and data privacy regulations","Technologies":"Blockchain technology for secure data management, encryption tools","People":"Technology users, data analysts, digital corporations","Owner":"City authorities, technology companies"},{"Description":"Limited community engagement and participation","Impact":"Reduced awareness and collaboration in disease prevention efforts","Mitigation":"Promoting community health education programs and establishing local health committees","Technologies":"Mobile health applications, virtual community engagement platforms","People":"Citizens, community leaders, healthcare providers","Owner":"Local government, healthcare organizations"}]}
